attributes.action: Get Britains roads sorted out or reduce the road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we have to pay expensive road tax when the roads are not kept in a fit state to drive on. There are pot holes everywhere and damaged surfaces that causes damage to our vehicles and nothing seems to get done about them? Why do we pay road tax? Its about time Britains roads were sorted out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
